column4: anyone knows where to get the Fire animation for CompizConfig setting manager? the drop down box on my system doesnt have the fire one...
please install the package compiz-config-gnome and find the icon in System / Preferences
whoops, for the manager... means you probably have it already
(from PM) I don't know where the fire plugin is, perhaps a search for 'compiz fire plugin' in Synaptic is in order though
